sports-social.title: Sports Social
sports-social.description: Sports Social is a social media platform for sports fans to connect with each other and share their thoughts on their favorite teams and players.

hollo.title: Hollo - Axolotl Control
hollo.description: Axolotl control was a freelance project which I worked on for a couple of months with Hollo ltd.

parallelchain-explorer.title: ParallelChain Explorer
parallelchain-explorer.description: ParallelChain Explorer is a web interface that allows users to view the blocks and transactions on the ParallelChain blockchain.

payphone.title: PayPhone
payphone.description: PayPhone is a mobile application that allows users to make payments using their face.

algol.title: Algol
algol.description: Algol is a service built using ERC721 protocol that allows admins to issue and manage credentials like passports, degree certs, transcripts, medical records etc.
